doc:
Kathy Garver https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kathy_Garver 0 Kathleen Marie Garver (born December 13, 1945) is an American stage, film, television, and voice-over actress most remembered for having portrayed the teenage niece, Catherine "Cissy" Davis, to series character Uncle Bill Davis, played by Brian Keith, on the popular 1960s CBS sitcom, Family Affair. Before that, she was cast by Cecil B DeMille in the film The Ten Commandments (1956). She is also known as the voice of Firestar in the animated television series Spider-Man and his Amazing Friends. Garver authored The Family Affair Cookbook (2009), Surviving Cissy: My Family Affair of Life in Hollywood (2015), and X Child Stars: Where are They Now? (2016). Kathleen_Marie_Garver ( born December_13_,_1945 ) is an_American_stage , film , television , and voice-over_actress most_remembered for having_portrayed the_teenage_niece , Catherine_"_Cissy_"_Davis , to series_character_Uncle_Bill_Davis , played by Brian_Keith , on the_popular_1960s_CBS_sitcom , Family_Affair . Before that , she was_cast by Cecil_B_DeMille in the_film The_Ten_Commandments ( 1956_) . She is_also_known as the_voice of Firestar in the_animated_television_series_Spider-Man and his_Amazing_Friends . Garver authored The_Family_Affair_Cookbook_(_2009_) , Surviving Cissy : My_Family_Affair of Life in Hollywood_(_2015_) , and X_Child_Stars : Where are They Now ? (_2016_) .
